name: PRE - S - First Fix - Electrical
Check all drawings, plan symbols are identified and wired for, raise any anomalies
Check wall and ceiling outlets and fitting positions against Architectural/ Electrical drawings and acceptable
Check for any purchaser variations/ client extras
Check all power & light feeds present and acceptable
Check loop wires installed and acceptable
All joinery plans are followed and correct position of outlets installed and acceptable
Flush boxes straight and level and acceptable
Fire rated flush boxes where required + fire pads installed and acceptable
Lights are marked out on plans or floor ready for cut out
Electrical First Fix completed and acceptable and area clean and tidy for next trade
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
POST - S - Second Fix - Electrical
All cover plates in place & fitted correctly and straight
All light fittings tight & secure and acceptable
All cables are tied up
Switch board fit off is completed and acceptable
Test sheet for insulation Resistance are completed and acceptable
Fixtures level & in place  and acceptable
